info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 3:32PM CDT until August 06 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TUSCALOOSA AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 332 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bull City to Brookwood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Birmingham, Hoover, Bessemer, Hueytown, Lipscomb, Lake View, Brookwood, North Johns, Bull City, Abernant, Bluff Park, Splash Adventure, Patton Creek, Ross Bridge, Riverchase Galleria, Promenade Tannehill, East Brookwood, Shannon, Bent Brook Golf Club and Lake Harris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
